summary: When Lou's romantic plot to win the heart of his model congress running-mate falls apart, he's forced to improvise.
cast: Keenan Jolliff|Harrison Chad|Jessica Rothe|Aaron Sauter|Alexander Flores|Massey|Luis Rico Hernandez Jr.|Alejandra Rico Hernandez|Sol Miranda|Gilbert Cruz|Jeff Lima|Luz Vazquez|Antonio Aguinaga|Alice Lee|Doreen Montalvo|Arianne Recto|Ken Kunimoto|John Gutierrez|Alyssa May Gold|Amy Pack|Rick Albert|Ryan Woodle|Kate Pak|Arnold Y. Kim|Nadia Bowers|Woodwyn Koons|Stephen Price Jr.|Eric Sauter|Beth Olanoff|Julie Lauren
title: Jack, Jules, Esther & Me
